responses: Hello, thanks for visiting. Welcome to Pytea Bubble tea shop. How can we assist you?

patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell organic and healthy bubble tea.
Our most popular drink is classic fruit tea with our signature protein pearl. Check out our menu for an excellent series of drinks!
Try our special relax unsweeten shiok summer tea, for a refreshing stress reliever!
We accept VISA, Mastercard , Paynow, Paylah and Singtel Dash.We also allow you to order first and pay at the counter later.
We accept most major credit cards and debit card. We also allow you to order first and pay at the counter later.

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery is on the day itself. We would recommend for large orders to be place 1-2 days before.
Shipping is on the day itself. We would recommend for large orders to be place 1-2 days before.
Our top topping is our signature protein pearl, which comes with a sweat and nutrious flavour. We also sell the classic black pearl, jelly and pudding.

patterns: Is there any environmental things you do?
responses: Our company uses only the most eco-friendly biodigradable cups and straw to ensure that we do not contribute to both plastic and paper waste.
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

patterns: Do you have a staff called amber?
responses: That is our staff member.
